column1:
Path to the template. Example: tm/highlight/product/grid.phtml
Works only when previous option is set to 'Custom Template'
column2:
Path to the template. Example: tm/highlight/product/grid.phtml
Works only when previous option is set to 'Custom Template'

column1: Example: 10,15,current - Products from category 10 or 15 or active category
column2: Example: 10,15,current - Products from category 10 or 15 or active category

column1: Example: 100,200 - Products with price between 100 and 200
column2: Example: 100,200 - Products with price between 100 and 200

column1: Example: simple,bundle - Show only simple and bundle products
column2: Example: simple,bundle - Show only simple and bundle products
